item.title: Cargo Plane Slides Off Hong Kong Runway, Killing 2 Ground Crew
item.description: The Boeing 747-400, arriving from Dubai, skidded off the runway after landing and fell into the sea, Hong Kong officials said.

item.title: Violence Flares in Gaza, and White House Responds to Protests: ‘Who Cares?’
item.description: Plus, a brazen heist at the Louvre.

item.title: Louvre Museum Remains Closed After Jewelry Robbery: What to Know
item.description: A stunning heist has raised uncomfortable questions about security at the famed Paris museum.
